titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honorable House of Lords, in the Abbey Church at Westminster, Wednesday the 25. day of Iune, 1645. Being the day appointed for a solemne and publique humiliation. / By Samuel Rutherfurd Professor of Divinitie at St. Andrews.
titleStmt.author: Rutherford, Samuel, 1600?-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.C. for Andrew Crook, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Greene Dragon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
